elements.title: ESC Net Zero Go
elements.description: Net Zero Go provides councils with a platform to help them put decarbonisation strategies in place and develop successful, locally-focused zero carbon projects. Created by Energy Systems Catapult in partnership with Salesforce, providers of Net Zero Cloud, and IBM

elements.title: Public Sector Decarbonisation Scheme investment
elements.description: Rochdale council has secured £11m funding through the government’s Public Sector Decarbonisation Scheme (PSDS)

elements.title: Climate Emergency
elements.description: list of local authorities of all political persuasions that have declared climate & ecological emergencies and are creating action plans to deliver on their ambitions. Head to section [action plans](https://data.climateemergency.uk/) for the full dataset

elements.title: UK100
elements.description: UK100 is the only network for UK locally elected leaders who have pledged to play their part in the global effort to avoid the worst impacts of climate change by switching to 100% clean energy by 2050.

elements.title: Bristol City Leap
elements.description: City Leap is a series of energy and infrastructure investment opportunities that represent a big step towards a cleaner, greener Bristol.
